testCases.title: Verify clicking the 'Pod Gallery' button
expected: The application navigates to the main 'Pod Gallery' section or page
Current URL changes to 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/pod-gallery' (inferred)

testCases.title: Verify clicking the 'Upgrade' button
expected: The application navigates to the 'Upgrade' or 'Pricing' page
Current URL changes to 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/upgrade' (inferred)

testCases.title: Verify script generation with only the required podcast topic

inputs.podcast_topic_value: The Future of AI in Healthcare

steps: Enter 'The Future of AI in Healthcare' into the podcast topic input field
expected: The 'GENERATE SCRIPT' button indicates activity (e.g., spinner, disabled state)
A success message or status update is displayed, indicating script generation has started
A new podcast entry appears in 'Your Podcasts' section with a 'Script In Progress' or similar status

testCases.title: Verify script generation with all available fields filled
steps: Enter 'Innovations in Renewable Energy' into the podcast topic input field
Click the Language input, then select 'English (Indian)'
Click the No. of Speakers input, then select '2'
Click the Category input, then select 'Business'
Click the Duration input, then select '2.5 - 4 Minutes'
Click the Tone input, then select 'Formal'
Enter 'Dr. Alex Green' into the Name of Host field
Enter 'Prof. Maya Singh' into the Name of Guest field
expected: The 'GENERATE SCRIPT' button indicates activity and then a success message
A new podcast entry appears in 'Your Podcasts' section with the selected details and a 'Script In Progress' status

testCases.title: Verify validation for missing required podcast topic when generating script
steps: Leave the podcast topic input field empty
expected: A validation error message (e.g., 'Podcast topic is required') is displayed near the podcast topic input
The script generation process does not start
The user remains on the current page, and no new podcast entry is created

testCases.title: Verify functionality of the AI Knowledge toggle switch
steps: Observe the initial state of the 'AI Knowledge' toggle and 'Select Artifact' button (assuming it starts disabled)
expected: The 'AI Knowledge' toggle switch changes to an 'on' state (e.g., visual feedback like color change)
The 'Select Artifact' button and 'My Knowledge Source' section become enabled/interactive
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai

testCases.title: Verify selecting an option from the Language dropdown
steps: Click the 'Language' input field to open the dropdown
expected: The 'Language' input field displays 'English (Indian)' as the selected value
The dropdown menu closes
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai

testCases.title: Verify selecting an option from the 'No. of Speakers' dropdown

expected: The 'No. of Speakers' input field displays '2' as the selected value
The dropdown menu closes
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai

steps: Click the 'Category' input field to open the dropdown
expected: The 'Category' input field displays 'Business' as the selected value
The dropdown menu closes

expected: The 'Tone' input field displays 'Formal' as the selected value
The dropdown menu closes

testCases.title: Verify inputting values into Host and Guest name fields
steps: Enter 'Alex Turner' into the 'Name of Host' input field
Enter 'Brenda Lee' into the 'Name of Guest' input field
expected: The 'Name of Host' input field displays 'Alex Turner'
The 'Name of Guest' input field displays 'Brenda Lee'
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai

testCases.title: Verify clicking on a 'Podcast Ready' item in the gallery
steps: Click the podcast item titled 'Stories of the Gig Economy' with 'Podcast Ready' status
expected: The application navigates to the detailed view of the 'Stories of the Gig Economy' podcast
Current URL changes to 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/podcast/stories-of-the-gig-economy' (inferred)

testCases.title: Verify clicking on a 'Script Ready' item in the gallery
steps: Click the podcast item titled 'Making Sense of the Future wit...' with 'Script Ready' status
expected: The application navigates to the detailed view of the 'Making Sense of the Future wit...' podcast, displaying the generated script
Current URL changes to 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/podcast/making-sense-of-the-future' (inferred)

testCases.title: Verify clicking on a 'Script Failed' item in the gallery
steps: Click the podcast item titled 'The 5 AM Club Fallacy: Is Slee...' with 'Script Failed' status
expected: The application navigates to the detailed view of 'The 5 AM Club Fallacy: Is Slee...' podcast, showing error details
Current URL changes to 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/podcast/5-am-club-fallacy' (inferred)

testCases.title: Verify handling of long host name input (boundary)

inputs.host_name_value: Professor Bartholomew Percival Fitzgerald III, The Grand Overseer of Infinite Wisdom and Podcasts

steps: Enter 'Long Host Name Test' into the podcast topic input field
Enter a very long string ('Professor Bartholomew Percival Fitzgerald III, The Grand Overseer of Infinite Wisdom and Podcasts') into the 'Name of Host' input field
expected: The input field either truncates the input, displays a character limit warning/error, or successfully accepts the long name
If successful, script generation proceeds; if validation error, script generation is blocked
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai

testCases.title: Verify handling of special characters in Host and Guest names
steps: Enter 'Special Character Podcast' into the podcast topic input field
Enter 'H0st-N@me! (Host)' into the 'Name of Host' input field
Enter 'Gu3st$N@me (Guest)' into the 'Name of Guest' input field
expected: The system accepts the special characters in the host and guest names, and the script generation proceeds successfully
Alternatively, if special characters are not allowed, a validation error message is displayed for the respective fields
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai

testCases.title: Verify the 'Select Artifact' button is only active when AI Knowledge is enabled
steps: Ensure the 'AI Knowledge' toggle switch is in the 'off' state (default or manually set)
Attempt to click the 'Select Artifact' button
Click the 'AI Knowledge' toggle switch to enable it
expected: When 'AI Knowledge' is off, the 'Select Artifact' button is disabled and non-clickable
After enabling 'AI Knowledge', the 'Select Artifact' button becomes enabled
Clicking the enabled 'Select Artifact' button opens an artifact selection modal or navigates to an artifact management page
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai

testCases.title: Verify visibility of required field indicators on initial page load
steps: Observe the input fields and their labels
expected: The podcast topic input field should have a visible '*' or 'Required' indicator
All other fields like Language, No. of Speakers, Category, Duration, and Tone should either implicitly be marked as optional or have a visible '*' if required
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai

testCases.title: Verify clicking the SnapPod Logo navigates to the main dashboard/welcome page
expected: The page reloads or navigates to the primary dashboard/welcome page
Current URL remains 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai' (if it's already the dashboard) or navigates to a root dashboard like 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/' (inferred)

testCases.title: Verify clicking the user profile ('TJ') navigates to the user settings or profile page
expected: A user menu/dropdown is displayed, or the application navigates to the user's profile/settings page
Current URL changes to 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/profile' or 'https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/settings' (inferred)

testCases.title: Verify clicking the 'All' tab in the 'Your Podcasts' section
steps: Click the 'All' tab within the 'Your Podcasts' section
expected: The list of podcasts in the 'Your Podcasts' section updates to display all podcasts without any specific filters
The 'All' tab is visually highlighted as the active/selected tab
Current URL is https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai
